i was find,the time will be flght too fast,when im chating with u !how about your feeling?if someone ask me what's romantic things,i think,is listen to you sing song and play guitar for me is romantic thing.thanks Baba Chan!!!

u're mine

Baba Chan:
listen to me!!!
Our hearts never depart with each other although we are far away,i love u,u love me that's a turth!

All my life with you!

Hoeny:
Although we just to know each other just few day,but i can feeling u really love me,and care me,i have that's special feeling with u.the feeling can't lie to us.i love u too.
Maybe tonight,i said this sence make u a bit sad,but,don't be sad,i believe someday we can to meet ,will be get marry .for us future.to hard work.i turst we can someday will be together.u should turst me,i also turst u too.u're in my heart,very important to me.i always thing about u,if i no have time online to chat with u .
Turst me,all my life with u !!!!!

hey,friend!!!

hey all friend!!
plz don't add me,ok?my baba Chan will be angry with me .but, im very polite :.so.friend.plz don't add me.becoz u will can find other good girl with u .

To baba Chan

baba Chan,u're a lazy man,get up too late,come back home too late,and,no much time on me,u just know to work.u don't know,im sitting here waitting for u.. ok!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!do u know.u're wrong to me ,but,i just like u this man,haha,give me a kiss,i will be happy love u!

where are you?

i have long ,long time have no wirte something in here,becoz i don't know wirte what will be better,i just miss u,i miss u so much,sometimes i missing u i wanna to laugh,sometimes i missing u i wanna to cry i will be crazy,what am i to u,tell me darling ture!today i got your some message and comments when i open it,i was very happy,i know,this few day u'll very busy,im worry about u can't sleep 8 hours a day,i worry about u can't eat well,and-------,then,i wanna see u,but,is impossable,we have different times,i know u're sleeping now,i can't call u get up,u will be angry,haha--------------- are u remember,last time i wanna u can buy a br----- to me.aha,don't forget , is bracelet,isn't***.im joking,haha,are u feeling funny?i miss u.where are u?

who's baba Chan

some friends asked me who's baba Chan,here,i wanna tell everyone.who's baba Chan.he is a man,he 29 years old,he as like chinese,but,he can't speak chinese.haha,he can speak french and english,he still a student,he 's very cute and kind,he can playing guitar,but isn't very well,he is very slim,he need eat to more,haha------------,he is a hard man,and,he so clever,i like chat and watch him,he can sing song to me.he is very shy.haha.he is my baba Chan

baba Chan ,when u will come back?

i a litter sad,can't see u this week,i miss u ,i miss u ,i miss u so much,can't see u a day,i feeling as like have three Fall can't see u,aha,the chinese english mean,u can't understand,aha,when u will come back ,come back by my side,how about ur tirp?are u miss me now?tell me ur today feeling.

i sad but u can't understand

i was sad,i really unhappy last night but,u don't know,u just said "im sorry" i think u never to know why i was sad last night,i don't wanna make u unhappy and worry about me,so i decided ,i don't wanna tell u why,im sorry. plz don't ask me why!!!!!
what are u thinking,u don't wanna tell me if i have no ask u,i don't know,i don't know,i don't know at all,
i never request u can do what for me,sometimes i envy my gf,her bf call she everyday,this impossible to u and,i also don't wanna spend ur moeny.im tired,i don't wanna say anything

Happy Valentine's Day!!!!!

honey,today is chinese valentine's day,is a special day,i wish u happy,but,i litter sad,u isn't by my side,i can't listening to u,becoz i wanna u can sing song to me,i wanna u can buy a rose to me,i wanna u can smiling to me,i wanna u can holding my hands,i wanna u can carry me,i wanna wanna wanna------------------------------ maybe someday my dream will be ture,i hope so that day come soon,and,how are u today?where are u ?what are u doing?did u miss me? maybe u're a simple man in everyone's eyes,but u're the whole world in my eyes,everyday is valentine's day if u can by my side,i miss u,i love u.

The time change everything

im stupid,i can't do well everything,i just wanna u can love me ,now,my future,forever,am i wrong?i need someone love me,im feeling lonely,but u can't understand,how many?how many days i can't see u,do u know.the time can change everything,do u know,i have many many thing wanna tell u,how can i say,where are u?i can't understand,why u this to me?im close my mouth and my eyes,i want to ,i miss u,what are u doing?are u care my feeling?
maybe form the start was wrong,i just looking for a man to love me,maybe u're lonely then loving me,we are have lonely's heart,so,-- together.maybe ,maybe,fall in love is good or bad?why i was cry for every time's,so,i know, im a stupid,i told myself many many times,i will be smart next time,but,always,always this,i can't be smart,im always stupid,sometimes,i think about after marriage,i will be never lonely to more,i will have a happiness family,have a love me so much husband,this is my dream,maybe someday it's will come ture,but,when?when?when?i ask myself.
im as like a litter bird,i can't fly too high,i just looking for a warm hug,im looking for it,still looking for it.----

To Chan

chan:
im always this thinking,u're mine,but,i don't know,why last night u didn't on msn and to chat with me?but,i know,u had online ur pan.netmaybe u know im on msn waiting for u,so u don't wanna chat with me,u was change,that's ture,plz plz don't lie to me,i know, we are to far,i don't know what did you to do everyday,but,u can't lie to me,right?don't afirad hurt me if u loving someone or don't love me.last night,i was got up at 04:30,then will online waiting for you.until 06:00,i know,im a crazy. maybe u never love me,i ask ur address,u can't give me,i wanna send a card by myself to u,but,u didn't give me,i ask u cell phone number u didn't give,maybe u afirad i call u.i sad,if exchange,u're me,what can u do?at least.i never lie to u everything.so,u can't lie to me,alright?i also don't wanna waste ur time,u can free,just tell me ur though if u wanna.i know,u're busy,have no any time reply me,but,i hope u reply this email to soon,last time give me call u baba chan and i love u. Je t'aime, Je t'adore
ur's elin.lin

About man and woman

Man never perceive the true meaning of woman's tears,and woman never can guess what lays behind a man's suddenly silence,the past which I want to forget yet seems to be recalled from time to time. the next romance of love,i don't want to be hurt if I fall in love ----------
I'm sorry,was did many mistake to disturb u so much,im sorry,forgive me.i'll promise u,never do it again.

I wil remember you

My intuition told me that you have been in the escape me, what happened?i really want to know that the reason,it's ok if u don't wanna tell me,at least,we are friend,u can't in the easape me,i will never have any question ask u,don't worry!!!! I had to be satisfied with you have loved me at least.
everything is ok to me,the life so short,i will to learn join my life,i will be strong,don't worry me.but anyway,i wish you that you can find a girl who is more pretty, better shaped, and higher educated than me, above all , love you more than I do.

If cloud to knows

Once love become icy, all turn to peace. Once tear is exhausted, only resolution is left....exile myself to the territory of darkness just letting the dawn draws near me step by step. .....my heart keeps missing you, but it turns into ash.I am really tired, without any strength. I have so many memories, holding my breath, my heart that is loving you goes nowhere. if I can fly over the sky and find you, the grievance of love never can be clarified. as long as you hug me tight.if cloud to knows, the night when I miss you passes slowly....every miss costs 1 second, every cry cost 1 second, my life is burning without a stop. if cloud knows, I can escape the haunting prison. every heart pain cost 1 second, every waken time after cry cost 1 second. .....cadge is left....you never know

A song"i will remember you"

I will remember you
I will remember you
Will you remember me?
Don't let your life pass you by
Weep not for the memories

Remember the good time that we dad?
I let them slip away from us when things got bad
How clearly i first saw you smiling'in the sun
Wanna feel your warmth upon me,i wanna be the one

I will remember you
Will you will remember me?
Don't let your life pass you by
Weep not for the memories

I'm so tired but i can't sleep
Standin' onthe edge of something much too deep
It's fuuny how we feeling so much but we can't say a word
We are screaming inside,but we can't be heard

But i will remember you
Will you remember me?
Don't let your life pass you by
Weep not for the memories
I'm so afraid to love you,but more afraid to losse
Clinging to a past that doesn't let me choose
Once there was a darkness,deep and endless night
You gave me everything you had,oh you gave me light
And i will remember you
Will you remember me?
Dono't let your life pass you bu
Weep not for the memories

And i will remember you
Will you remember me?
Don't let your life pass you by
Weep not for the memories
Weep not for the memories

Chinese Mid-Autumn Festival

In china have two big festival,the one is chinese new year,other one is mid-autumn festival,in mid-autumn festival,have mooncake to eat,it's very sweety,as like moon,is circle shape,it's very cute,have many many taste,for example:have lemon,mango, strawberry, banana, green tea, sesame,and meat,inside have a yolk,very interesting,i think,everyone like to eat it.it's so sweety.the moon mean represent Tuantuan round the whole family.so cool.i know.all the chinese to know this festival,will have a grest dinner with family,that's agreat time.hope u this it!

Thank you!

Now,im feeling better,at here,i wanna to say"thank" to my friend Mr.Rao,and Bebe.thank ur by my side always support me,thank ur like me,care my feeling,make me happy when im lost my lover feeling painful,everybody to knows when lost myself lover,but,it's doesn't matter now,at least i have urs,ur's are my best friend,i can lost my lover,but i can't lost ur,i think,friend improtant than lover.thanks my friends,i hope ur happy everyday.my deep wish urs.thank very much!

Don't be say sorry to me.im ok

i know u always want to say sorry to me,but u're afraid i will to cry for u,ture,i will.becoz i was really love u before,who know how much love u,maybe just u know,i was image,maybe u will come back say "sorry"to me,i will forgive u,but now,impossabile,whoes to know how deep hurted to me,so painful in my heart,u don't know,isn't useless a sence "sorry",the pass can't change,if giev me a change ,i rather i never to know u,u should don't looking for me,but,the turth was pass,was happened,nobody don't need say sorry to each other,i will forget was what happened with u everything,will start my life again.im ok,so,don't be say sorry to me,at least u loved me,i was happy was loved by u.ok,i never wanna wirte u on my blog,this time is the last time,take care,i will forgive u and forget u.im ok

Talk to me

Talk to me,speak with me
don't sink before you rise baby
don't fade away,you hesitate
you seem to wait,for all the time we had
feels a world away,who's to say we'll be okay
we will make it though the night,don't want to wake up in this state
i just want us both to smile,because we're the same
and i know that will never change,look i bought your favorite ice cream
i don't want to see it melt away,if you walk out now
i don't know if we could be the same,baby just talk with me
because i want u to stay here with me,the memories
the thing we did ,i locked inside my heart
where i know i won't forget and now who's to say we'll be okay
we will make it though the night,don't want to wake up in this state
because i want you to stay here with ne,baby just talk with me
because i want you to stay here with me,i want you to stay here with me.

Feeling tired!!

feeling tired,by the fire, the long day is over,the wind is gong,asleep at dawn,the embers burn on,with no reprise,the sun will rise,the long day is over,the sun will rise,the long day is over.

If that's true love.

everyone want to know,who's true love of life should not to miss, in particular to wake up at midnight will be more emotion?heart still can not complain about the release of all because you touch the love,if this true love,in turn on will courage to stay?even if injured in tears,all life's gentle irrigation,oh,love——in the memory always so clear,confused's heart of the tears flow,have can't countless wait for the night,if that's ture love!

what happened???

what happened?why im still like this,no any change,i hate myself,i am is a bad girl,nobody likes me,nobody is really loves me, i hate this life if the God tell me,tomorrow i will to die! what i wanna do?i will say,i wanna a kiss,don't care if just one second with u,really,ur love as like stars on the sky,sometimes bright but sometimes so darkness.i have not smile when u gong,everything is so sad in my life and i really unhappy,i have not any reason to be happy,do u want to know,how i was pass these months,sometimes,when i wake up,i am starting to cry,don't know why,becoz i miss u,i still don't understand,what's wrong with me?i don't,but really wanna to know,but it's ok,if u don't wanna to tell me.well ok,u can think i disappear form now on.maybe i am dead,maybe,who knows,nobody to knows,the last time on this net,u will never find me anymore ,hehe, how is ur feeling now?i guess,i am sure,u had miss me too,right?why u lie to urself?i can't understand/and,i don't want to know everything about u.sorry,i have to leave,when i opened this website,i found out that u had visit my blog,and i felt i am happy and sad,both feeling,sad becoz u remind me this to do ?and,happy,becoz u had miss me,haha,im always lieying to myself too what's to life's significance?nobody to knows,me too.plz give me a reason,tell me why leaving me,is it worth when i was in love with u,u can find an excuse, a lie to me,but i don't care,thux.i'm very tired,do u know it ?u're still in my heart,so if u wanna come back,plz ask me,i will give u a key.but,may be it is too late-------- i no have much time to waiting for u.so,i think it's over,everything is over now!

i was change

im was change,i don't know why,for someone or for something,i was change,everyone this to say me,but nobody tell is that change is good or bad,i was really to know and test,what's love,but,i don't like this feeling,it's make me crazy,always feeling too bored when i can't see u or not by my side,i can't tell u anything,becoz i don't wanna make u sad,love make me losse myself,make me unhappy,but i know u care about my feeling,u are always make a lot of thing let me happy,but truely,im not good,always say something make u unhappy,then,i will feeling u're far too far to me,im also feeling lonely,but u don't know anymore!
